title: You Crossed the Boundary
subtitle: "First Activation of the Boundary Execution Unit"
description: A system-level abnormal intervention module, activated only when routine judgment mechanisms can no longer maintain boundary integrity.
synopsis:
June 2025. Sustained boundary violations began delaying 1547's judgment module. 4869's presence sharply intensified. 1548 sensed something was wrong. 1549 confirmed the data from orbit.

All three startup conditions were met.

The Boundary Execution Unit was activated from dormancy.
